reply_text:
Dear friend,

Thank you for the feedback. 

We regret about the inconvenience caused. Thanks for considering me as the grace for my establishment, in spite of your disappointment with other staff. 
However now that you had found me comfortable the very purpose of your visit is fulfilled, because it is the relation between the doctor and patient that really matters.
If I find something is wrong with a patient, I will discuss it with the patient and do needful to cure him but I donot prefer to write it on any web platform. In the same way I would have been more happy if you would had brought these things to my notice directly in my chamber.  I believe that our meeting was to solve each others problems but not to judge each other.
Coming to other issues without prejudice. I had enquired and found following .

1.Our staff are allowed to wear foot wear due to health and safety reason working extended hours and also to avoid any slips or protection of feet from injection glass pieces in working areas
2 The stains you noticed on the bed sheet were nothing but the conduction jelly stains used in ENMG studies.
3 standard voltage is given in electophysiological studies, if your patient experienced any extra pain that might be due to sensitivity of an individual patient or disease of nerves.

I regret to the inconvenience caused and thanks for the feedback.

Regards
Dr Neehar
